changes: Fix: Details panel no longer gets stuck in position
Fix: Selecting a new place with a detail panel open now closes and opens a new panel
Added: Button to re-orientate map to north
Added: [WikiData] Option to specify max number of concurrent WikiData requests
Fix: Unable to swipe down to dismiss information panel
Improvement: Made map interactive when information panel is small
Improvement: Details of the last 10 entities details are now cached for faster re-opening
Improvement: Map areas are loaded in parallel (~4x faster)
Fix: Unable to discover information about all places.
